title.rendered: Digiperform Launches its 30th Centre in Bengaluru – Indiranagar.

content.rendered:
Digiperform in Indiranagar is all set to rock your career with Digital Marketing

Bengaluru is known for being the center of India’s high-tech industry. It is one of the most progressive and developed cities which is blessed with a loving and career oriented people. Therefore, Digiperform is geared up to provide a digital career platform to the people of Bengaluru; as it has announced the opening of its 30th center in Bengaluru – Indiranagar with a great pomp and fervour.   The center has launched on 15th July – 2018 followed by a great ceremony. On this auspicious occasion, Neena Gangwani (Digiperform Indiranagar Partner) quoted, “Digital marketing is a great domain for anyone right from students, working professionals, and business owners. There are lacs of jobs available in this field but only a few are digitally equipped to pursue them. Digiperform bridges the gap between the industry and workforce through its award-winning course in digital marketing. Our Center at Indiranagar has launched on 15th July 2018 and we already have our hands full with enquiries. We are happy to play our part towards a Digital India.” Digiperform is India’s Most Trusted Brand in Digital Education that solely aims at imparting online marketing skill training to a million people and help them to achieve the best in their business as well as career. There are multiple of certification training programs offered by Digiperform to fresh graduates, working professionals, and wannabe entrepreneurs, enabling them to be self-employed, get placed in top organizations & understand the operation of Digital Marketing to run their own empires.

The certifications are:

  • Digiperform Certified Digital Marketing Executive Course (dCDME)
  • Digiperform Certified Digital Marketing Consultant Course (dCDMC)
Other than this there are multiple certifications that are offered by different ad tools and platforms that can be added to CVs. The major includes Google Adwords & Analytics Certifications, Bing Ads, Facebook Blueprint Certifications and Multiple Content & Inbound Marketing Certifications offered by Hubspot. It focuses on delivering high valued digital marketing curriculum to masses through its learning management system and classroom training facilities.

DIGIPERFORM HIGHLIGHTS:

Digiperform is India’s fastest growing Digital Marketing Training Company born under astounding duos; Manu Jolly, a serial entrepreneur, and Vaibhav Vats, a digital marketing savant. In the past 3 years, Digiperform has been acknowledged by various achievements such as:
  • Awarded as the “Most Trusted Brand in Digital Education 2017” by WCRC Leaders Asia (Leading Marketing Research Firm and Magazine for Asian Leaders) held in New Delhi.
  • Awarded as “India’s Most Promising Brand 2017” in Education sector by WCRC Leaders Asia out of Top 50 Indian Companies under numerous categories in 5th Asian Brands & Leadership Summit held in Bangkok, Thailand.
  • Digiperform awarded in Gold Category status by WCRC for recently launched Digital Marketing Executive Curriculum, Certifications and LMS developed for Digital Marketing Trainings.
  • This Award Winning LMS includes all the required study material as a private feature available for registered students 24X7.
  • 15000+ students already trained in over 250+ batches.
